Introduction. - Topography. - Stratigraphy. - Small Finds. - Pottery. - Catalogue [1-1611]. - Bibliography.

RODZIEWICZ Mieczyslaw D., in co-operation with Elzbieta RAWSKA-RODZIEWICZ, Elephantine XXVII. Early Roman Industries on Elephantine.
